00040 class Element;
00041 class Probe;
00042 class Source;
00043 class Analysis;
00044 class DC;

00046 class Circuit
00047 {
00048   
00049 private:
00050      BMatrix::Sparse<double> G;
00051      BMatrix::Sparse<double> C;
00052      BMatrix::Sparse<double> fx; //the non linear vector
00053      BMatrix::Dense<double> B; 
00054      
00055      
00056      //Vector to hold list of elemets
00057      std::vector<Element*> components;
00058      
00059      //Vector to hold list of elemets
00060      std::vector<Source*> sources;
00061      
00062      //Vector to hold list of non linear elements. This is used to update the vector fx each iteration
00063      std::vector<Element*> Non_Linear_Elements;
00064      
00065      //Vector to hold list of analysis to be done on the circuit
00066      std::vector<Analysis*> required_analysis;
00067      
00068      //associative array that maps the node name/current_name to its index
00069      std::map< std::string , int> mna_variable_indices;
00070      
00071      //Vector to hold list of elemets
00072      std::vector<Probe*> Probes;
00073      
00074      //associative array that saves the elements that addes extra nodes for currents like inductors. 
00075      //This is usefeull when we need to add mutual inductance. 
00076      //In this case we do not need to search in all elements
00077      // map<name , index_of_current>
00078      std::map< std::string , int> current_elements;
00079      
00080      void attach_elements();
00081      
00082      bool is_linear;
00083      
00084      bool have_dc_solution;
00085      DC* DC_Analysis; //saves a pointer to the DC analysis
00086

00088      Circuit();
00089     ~Circuit();
00090     
00091     int get_variable_index(std::string node_name); //return the index of the node
00092     
00093     void add_mna_variable(std::string node_name);
00094     
00095     inline void add_probe(Probe* _Probe){
00096           Probes.push_back(_Probe);
00097     }
00098     
00099     void add_current_element(std::string element_name);
00100     
00101     inline void add_source(Source* _src){
00102       sources.push_back(_src);
00103     }
00104     
00105     
00106     
00107

00109     inline void operator << (Analysis* an){
00110           required_analysis.push_back(an);
00111     }
00112     
00113     int size_of_mna(){return mna_variable_indices.size(); }
00114     
00115     bool is_circ_linear() {return is_linear; }
